snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin has revived a set of lapel pins, originally called the Hero of Socialist Labor award, aimed at working-class Russians.
abstract: Russia's Pres Vladimir V Putin revives Soviet-era award aimed at working-class Russians, part of his efforts to burnish his credentials as champion of working-class.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin has revived a set of lapel pins, originally called the Hero of Socialist Labor award, aimed at working-class Russians.

headline.seo: Putin Rehabilitates Labor Award Harking Back to Soviet Glory
headline.main: Putin Restores Worker Award of Soviet Era
headline.print_headline: Putin Restores Worker Award Of Soviet Era
